attributes.action: A cafe/coffee shop within the Education Centre within the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: To provide vising schools a area with refreshments to share their experience.
attributes.background: After visiting the education centre, which was lengthy there was no opportunity to sit debrief and rehydrate. We feel this would also benefit employees there.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about refreshment areas are a matter for the Parliamentary Education Centre, rather than a decision about policy or legislation that is made by the Government or Parliament.
